name: MistVerse Burrow
description:
Game Made for Jestercraft Game Jam #1 in 24 hours

Movement and burrowing: WASD

Jump/Interact: Space

Theme: MIX OF THREE

Mixed features:

  1. Benches from Hollow Knight
  2. Digging from SteamWorld Dig
  3. Stamina from The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild

Got a bit sidetracked with Unity's Tilemaps and had to ditch some of the work I had done to get something done in the time limit :).

Git-repository: https://gitlab.com/SamiAutio/jestercraft-game-jam-1
